location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the Residency in the Persian Gulf, to Major Hart, Commanding Marine Battalion, Bombay

mods.abstract: Reporting the death of Private Calnac Sonnac, who served with the 6th Company Marine Battalion. The sale of the deceased man's possessions is noted, with the total realised, and a bill of exchange included. In the margin, a list of possessions to be given to the deceased man's family is included.
